ICICI

quiz.text: What of the following statements is/are true about Green Banking?
options: It stresses on environmental friendly practices

It aims at reducing carbon footprint from

banking activities.
It promotes deployment of clean energy technologies
It needs private sector investments
All of these

quiz.text: Which is the first Indian bank outside India ?
options: Bank of India

Bank of Baroda

quiz.text: What is a Bad Bank ?
options: It gives loan at a very high interest rate
It takes over all bad loans and help to sell the property in a private market
It takes more time to sanction a loan
The loan-policy of this bank is very complex
None of these

quiz.text: NPA stands for which of the following ?

Non Permanent Assets

None of these

quiz.text: PARA stands for which of the following ?

Public Sector Asset Rehabilitation Agency
Public Associated Rehabilitation Agency
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following is/are the function(s) of world Bank ?
options: It works for reduction of poverty worldwide
It provides loans to countries of the world for capital programs
It promotes gender equality
It ensures environmental sustainability
All of these

It is a crypt-currency and a payment system
It is a software protocol

quiz.text: Which of the following is not an advantage of Bitcoins ?
options: It can not be stolen
No transaction cost is required
No central Bank has authorized Bitcoin
It can not be tracked
All are advantages
